```{r}
library(mlr3keras)

tsk = mlr_tasks$get("boston_housing")
embd = make_embedding(tsk)

output = embd$layer %>%
  layer_dense(12, activation = "relu") %>%
  layer_dense(1, activation = "linear")

model = keras_model(embd$input, output) %>%
  compile(
    optimizer = optimizer_adam(),
    loss = "mse"
  )

model$train()


```
